subtitles:
16081 20582 The Crow (2014)
- Subtitle By (NaShWaN AL-YeMeN 2021) -
23482 28160 October 30th - Devil's Night

45814 49234 People once believed
that when someone dies...

49313 53613 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

53694 57034 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

57114 62364 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

62454 65494 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

65584 70584 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
116255 120265 There's a piece of glass.

124846 129356 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

129436 132685 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

136275 140236 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

140325 142575 All right, guys,
let's do it.

142656 145866 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

147376 150206 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

150296 155176 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

158136 161467 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

161556 166347 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

166436 168726 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

168767 171647 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

171726 174316 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

174397 177856 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

177947 180947 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
181026 182947 All right, clear out.

184327 186917 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

189167 193377 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

193457 195667 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

195757 199678 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

209688 212518 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

212608 216647 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

216697 219988 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
220028 222368 She's my friend.
222448 226368 Her and Eric.
226408 228668 You lied to her about Eric.

230418 234128 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

234208 236548 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

245599 251309 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
251438 254858 She's gonna be fine.

273749 277799 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

277879 280759 I used to think that was true
about everything...
280839 285259 families, friends, feelings.

285309 289270 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

289309 293690 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

331940 335151 What are you,
like the night watchman?

356461 359841 You know, what this place
needs is a...
359921 362261 good natural catastrophe.

362341 366761 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

366801 369811 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
369892 372182 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
372271 375312 Hey, hey, let me do it.

375402 379442 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

379482 381942 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

381992 383952 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
383992 386412 Hey, all right.
386492 388872 Now we're talking.
388952 393662 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

393752 397583 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

397672 401592 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

401672 403472 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

403552 407223 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
407302 410513 They make you fart big time.

416852 419562 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

419653 422283 from all the crap
floating around in it.
423442 427203 I wish I could have seen that.
487514 492015 Fire it up! Yeah!

531135 535065 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

558046 561416 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T- bird, cop car, cop car.

568677 571267 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

577317 579227 - Damn it!
- What was that?

579317 581987 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
582067 585367 Mickey, call it in for me!

679289 682380 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

682459 686970 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
687049 689260 Place looks fine to me.
689299 692140 Let's redecorate.
694639 698810 "Abash, the devil stood...

698850 701560 and felt how awful
goodness is.

701650 706240 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely. "
It's pornography.
719370 722130 No, no, no, me first.

769931 772841 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

776721 780311 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

780392 782311 Look at that.
Look at that.

783652 788112 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

791783 793782 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
793822 796952 You sick fuck.

796992 800712 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
803963 808342 Look at that!
810553 812592 Pussies drink last, man.

813843 816263 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

817683 820182 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
820273 822443 This one is.

822522 825443 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

825523 829823 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

829903 833783 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

833863 836953 - Fire it up! - Fire
it up! - Fire it up!
837033 839833 Fire it up! Fire it up!
839913 843004 Here's your shooters.

843083 845043 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

880455 883964 - I love you.
- Say that again.
889635 893054 Restaurant.

897724 900894 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

907945 910525 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

1008667 1011218 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

1011297 1015307 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
1015388 1017717 Leather purse. Leather.
1017808 1022307 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1022398 1026938 A blood stain
that's on here?

1027028 1029648 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

1029738 1032568 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
1032658 1035408 Right there for ya.
1035489 1039868 Decisions, decisions.
1041408 1044578 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1044669 1047669 ... child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1047708 1050089 Close the gate
when you go out!

1050168 1052839 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1055509 1058928 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1063649 1068108 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1173171 1176302 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1178892 1183142 Halloween ain't till manana.
1225142 1228563 Fuck, you murderer!

1228643 1231273 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1231353 1235444 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1235533 1238953 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1238993 1241574 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1241663 1246493 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1246583 1251543 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1251584 1254044 Her name was Shelly.

1254134 1257133 You cut her.
You raped her.

1257214 1263013 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1272234 1277154 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1277234 1281864 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1286584 1289125 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1289205 1291874 We never miss.

1302475 1304555 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1309645 1314485 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1339216 1343555 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1350936 1353696 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1358447 1361746 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1362866 1364787 Give me some of that
over there!

1367037 1370747 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1370797 1375586 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1375627 1379467 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1379546 1383766 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1383807 1387897 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1417927 1421718 You're thinking
about the past.
1424018 1426517 Dad gave me this.
1426598 1430768 Fifth birthday.

1430858 1435528 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1449418 1451879 Is she asleep?
1458088 1460339 I think we broke her.
1464349 1466469 I love her eyes.

1486080 1489249 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1507850 1513400 I told you to stay out of here.

1513440 1517110 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1517191 1521241 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1521280 1523620 I don't have any dolls.
1523700 1527080 Get some food, huh?

1527121 1530121 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1535841 1539510 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police. "
1549521 1552771 Thirty, forty dollars.
1554521 1556981 Who the fuck is this now?

1557021 1561191 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1564031 1567872 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1575462 1579712 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1587392 1591772 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1591812 1595772 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door. "
1597733 1600032 What are you talking about?
1600112 1602822 You heard me rapping, right?

1602902 1607033 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1609453 1612412 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1613963 1616292 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1620553 1625683 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1625763 1628302 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1636774 1639023 You're not paying attention.

1644194 1649494 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1651124 1654584 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1657294 1660964 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1666264 1668264 Who's this sack of shit?

1668343 1671304 That's Tin Tin, one of
T- bird's little helpers.

1671393 1674434 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1674524 1677314 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1677394 1681564 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1681654 1686364 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1686444 1688364 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1688455 1692204 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1693415 1695834 What the hell
do you call that?
1696875 1699465 I call it blood, detective.

1699544 1703345 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1703385 1706175 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1712895 1715815 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1715895 1718525 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1718565 1721485 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1721566 1725945 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1726035 1731535 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1735125 1737705 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1754606 1758816 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1782717 1785637 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1785717 1788807 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1788887 1791727 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1791808 1794437 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1794518 1796897 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1796977 1802067 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1802147 1805158 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1805237 1808988 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1809077 1811827 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1811907 1814578 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1816247 1819628 Each one of these is a life...
1819708 1822218 a life you helped destroy.

1822298 1824928 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1824968 1828678 I'm not gonna kill you.

1828758 1832928 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1841568 1845778 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1847659 1851748 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1851828 1855458 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1855538 1857669 Is that gasoline I smell?

1879899 1883360 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1883439 1885739 One root beer.
1887739 1890490 I can't do anything.

1890580 1895039 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1901840 1906760 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1906800 1909840 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1909930 1913850 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1913930 1919101 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1919151 1922480 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1922521 1926900 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1926991 1930120 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1931991 1935161 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1935250 1939250 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1939331 1942001 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1942041 1946670 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1946720 1951551 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1951641 1956101 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1956181 1958601 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1958691 1963272 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1963361 1965941 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1966031 1969531 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1969612 1974952 - He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1975041 1978712 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1978792 1981212 Get away from there!

1981291 1984422 Cops!
Get outta here!
1993262 1997602 Oh, great, great.

1997682 2000272 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

2000353 2002652 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2002732 2008572 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2008653 2012572 Little early
for Devil's Night.
2014163 2016873 You are very restless.

2016953 2020162 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2020253 2024503 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2035973 2039023 There are energies
aligning against you.

2039104 2041564 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

2060704 2064674 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2064754 2067964 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2068044 2069804 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2069884 2072554 You must be
awfully disappointed.

2072634 2075974 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2076014 2078314 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2078394 2082984 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2083025 2085605 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2085694 2088864 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2091535 2094114 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2094205 2096994 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2097035 2099874 That's very reassuring.

2099915 2103965 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2104045 2108505 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2108595 2110425 Call it my need to know.
2144046 2146625 Let go, you creep!

2151806 2155097 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2156516 2158896 He couldn't have stopped.

2158977 2163266 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2163356 2166397 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2170527 2175287 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2176447 2179956 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2196887 2201477 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2201558 2205898 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2205978 2209397 Annie... look at that.

2209488 2213697 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments... "
2213778 2215828 What is this, a petition?

2215908 2218788 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2218868 2222958 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2223038 2228918 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2229008 2232548 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2232639 2236638 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2243649 2247398 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2249649 2254409 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2254448 2256949 Ah, I owe you one!

2286729 2290609 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2290690 2294359 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2319261 2321890 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2328060 2330690 Come here, bird.

2330781 2332861 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2332940 2335280 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2335321 2337951 Here, birdie, birdie.

2337990 2340991 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2343621 2346831 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2351841 2353801 What the fuck?

2360181 2364731 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2367021 2369901 Don't sweat it.

2371611 2374652 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2382582 2387422 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2389422 2394342 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2394422 2397932 You need professional help.
2402393 2405023 He shoots! He scores!

2415153 2418863 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2418952 2421663 Stop me if you heard this one.

2421743 2424662 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2430083 2432843 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2432923 2436463 Don't you ever fucking die?
2436553 2438803 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2444314 2448894 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2451103 2455194 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2479424 2481434 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2484475 2487185 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2504955 2508835 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2520556 2525055 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2525146 2529895 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2540326 2545126 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2574897 2578576 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2578657 2580907 Now fill it up!
2581997 2585367 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2585456 2588127 I really need this.

2596717 2600677 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2600717 2603307 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2603387 2605847 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2605938 2608858 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2608938 2611727 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2615317 2618238 Hey, good night, Darla.
2620658 2624368 You stay put right there.
2632418 2635878 Get away, steamhead.

2667039 2672789 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2672839 2675589 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2675669 2678629 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2678719 2681679 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2681720 2683890 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2683969 2686099 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2686179 2690940 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2694020 2697530 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2701530 2703700 Good likeness.

2703780 2707500 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2707580 2709830 You still have your hat on.
2713750 2715840 I gotta sit down.
2725680 2729981 are you some kind of... ghost?

2739610 2744161 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2746161 2750251 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2750331 2753421 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2753502 2758091 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2758171 2760801 Come on. Read the file.

2760881 2765221 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2765301 2768521 Her body finally just gave it up.

2768562 2772442 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2782322 2784241 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2796962 2800262 I saw her
through your eyes.

2800342 2802423 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2802512 2807972 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2808052 2812812 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2812853 2815812 Give me something
I could work with.

2820653 2823153 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2823243 2826573 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2826663 2830123 would talk after
what happened to you?

2830203 2833413 I kept asking
questions and...

2833503 2836173 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2840173 2842133 This your wife?

2842213 2846684 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2851564 2855564 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2855644 2859154 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2859234 2862234 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2871874 2876334 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2881004 2884215 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2887845 2890555 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2893605 2899445 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2910535 2914045 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2914126 2917255 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2917335 2920385 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2920465 2923716 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2923755 2926306 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2926385 2930805 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2930896 2935896 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2935976 2938445 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2938526 2941026 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2941105 2946616 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2946695 2949456 You ain't lost everything.

2949536 2954626 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2954706 2958296 Fair enough. Catch.

2961927 2964346 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2964426 2966426 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2966467 2970136 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2970227 2974186 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2974266 2978397 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2981196 2986367 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2986447 2989697 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2989744 2993074 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2993075 2996085 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2996164 2998414 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2998504 3002004 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3002135 3005594 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3005675 3009054 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
3009134 3011394 Whatever the fuck that means.

3011435 3015225 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3016315 3018395 Want to relax
that thing now?

3018435 3023114 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3023195 3027575 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3027615 3030325 I ain't making all this up.

3030405 3034915 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3043505 3048515 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3058776 3061776 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3071076 3073366 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3076126 3081006 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
